definitions.text: English physicist who studied electromagnetic radiation and was a pioneer of radiotelegraphy (1851-1940)
a formal association of people with similar interests
examples: they formed a small lunch society
men from the fraternal order will staff the soup kitchen today

definitions.text: small house at the entrance to the grounds of a country mansion; usually occupied by a gatekeeper or gardener
a small (rustic) house used as a temporary shelter
any of various Native American dwellings
a hotel providing overnight lodging for travelers

examples: Where are you lodging in Paris?
lodge a bullet in the table
stick your thumb in the crack
The suspect was charged with murdering his wife
We are lodging three foreign students this semester
